an10.39:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an10.39:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an10.39:4.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, saṅgho bhinno hotī”ti?
an10.39:4.6: “Idhānanda, bhikkhū adhammaṃ dhammoti dīpenti, dhammaṃ adhammoti dīpenti, avinayaṃ vinayoti dīpenti … pe …
an10.39:4.8: Te imehi dasahi vatthūhi avakassanti apakassanti āveni kammāni karonti āveni pātimokkhaṃ uddisanti.
an10.39:4.9: Ettāvatā kho, ānanda, saṅgho bhinno hotī”ti.
an10.39:5.1: “Samaggaṃ pana, bhante, saṅghaṃ bhinditvā kiṃ so pasavatī”ti?
an10.39:6.1: * Āpāyiko nerayiko,
an10.39:6.5: Saṃghaṃ samaggaṃ bhinditvā,
